channel.title: team for root
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "team for root" - what is the best combo for root missions?

item.title: Re: team for root
item.content:encoded: Not sure what you mean. If by chances you mean attacks, then it's 200 for the first 10, 300 for the next and so on. Phases don't 'time out' like kaiju do. You can fight a phase for a month if you want (as long as you don't loose all your lives anyway) though the death chance goes up each day.

item.title: Re: team for root
item.content:encoded: thanks. i think i am still confused about how many chances i get. does that equal the level value?

item.title: Re: team for root
item.content:encoded:
Drain is the attribute used to fight phases. It's base value is equal to your season. Phase damage is damage done to phases (like the Sanin damage bonus against kaiju, but against phases).

When running fields, it doesn't matter what team you use as no team member you have has any effect at all for a very long time. After you get to Raging Passionate Melody, you can level up K.Y. and she will help you earn more core. She is also the first ally you get that affects anything in the fields.
